<div class="project-card">
<a href="https://github.com/moizd9/PowerBI_NYC_RealEstate_Analysis" target="_blank">
<h3>NYC Real Estate Analysis using Power BI</h3>
</a>
<p>This project presents an in-depth analysis of the residential real estate market in the Bayside neighborhood of Queens, NYC, using Power BI. The objective was to provide actionable insights for a real estate brokerage firm considering opening an office in Bayside. The analysis included importing data from a SQL database, data cleaning, creating a star schema, and performing revenue and forecast analyses to assess the market potential.</p>
</div>

<div class="project-card">
<a href="https://github.com/moizd9/NYC_RealEstate_DescreptiveAnalysis" target="_blank">
<h3>Descriptive Analysis of NYC Real Estate Market using R</h3>
</a>
<p>This project is a comprehensive analysis of real estate data for the Bayside neighborhood in NYC. Utilizing Power BI, the goal was to uncover trends, perform comparative analysis, and derive actionable insights to assist potential investors and real estate professionals in making informed decisions. The analysis involved cleaning raw data, identifying patterns, and conducting correlation and comparative studies across different neighborhoods.</p>
</div>
